ygData.subject: Re: BardSpeed (tm)
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 34 I raced my brother s druid with Spirit of Cheetah across East Commons.  While his spell lasted, he was slightly faster... Of course I have selo
ygData.messageBody:
At level 34 I raced my brother's druid with Spirit of Cheetah across East
Commons. While his spell lasted, he was slightly faster... Of course I have
selo with MM drums all the time and he gets 15 seconds of Cheetah. Haven't
tried the same race at 35. How often does the song get an upgrade?

Taneran

----- Original Message -----
From: Robin Wise 3 <eurmali@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 12:25 PM
Subject: [eqbards] BardSpeed (tm)


> From: "Robin Wise 3" <eurmali@...>
>
> Just something I wanted to share with you speed freaks out there...
>
> Last night I was crossing North Karana when I picked up GrimFeather on
> tracking. I was feeling a bit reckless, and figured I'd see how fast GF
> really is... so I ran under him (GrimFeather hits YOU for 72 points of
> damage!) and sped off. Well, turns out he is quite a bit slower than me
at
> 36 with MM drums. So now I am wondering if there is anything in the world
> faster than me other than Shadowed Men and higher-level bards...
>
> Aloro Silvertongue (E'ci)
> fleet-footed fool
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
